did.unittitle: Office of the Dean of Engineering Records

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Office of the Dean of Engineering

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into one series: Annual reports.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of annual reports following the split of the Office of the Dean of Arts, Sciences and Engineering into two separate offices.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Office of the Dean of Engineering was created in 2001 from a division of the Office of the Dean of Arts, Sciences and Engineering. Under the supervision of the Dean, the leadership at Tufts School of Engineering consists of Associate Deans and Directors, representing their respective areas of responsibility within the Schools.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. Copyright to all materials created by Tufts University employees in the course of their work is held by the Trustees of Tufts University.

controlaccess.subject: Administration and Governance -- Planning, evaluation, policies & procedures

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series consists of the Annual Reports of the School of Engineering following the split of the Office of the Dean of Arts and Sciences and the Office of the Dean of Engineering.
